entry.title: Markdown's Back!
entry.content:
## And we love it!
Markdown is handled by the md2gemini[1] package. It uses "paragraph" style links by default, but can be configured using the `MARKDOWN` settings dictionary.
=> https://github.com/makeworld-the-better-one/md2gemini 1: https://github.com/makeworld-the-better-one/md2gemini

entry.title: Oh yeah !
entry.content:
## Why not ?
After all, why not ? It's pretty simple to do it, and it will allow me to write my blogposts in rst ! YEAH !
=> /pictures/Sushi.jpg alternate text
